title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 131.6 - Exclusiveness of procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 131.6 - Exclusiveness of procedure

State Regulations

The point system, including provisions for point reduction, established by this Part applies only to administrative action taken under the
provisions of law specified in section
131.1
of this Part. It in no way
affects any administrative action taken under any other provision of the

Vehicle and Traffic Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
131.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
